nodes.text: Yorn Nuro was the male Twi'lek leader of the Nuro Pirates. Supporting the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Third battle of Felucia, the pirates captured a Nysillin farm and started supplying the nysillin to the Confederacy. During the battle, the famed Clone Commando RC-1138 commissioned a Jedi Knight to defeat Yorn, which was successfully carried out.
